header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Kids book idea, pictures, family tree and stories, brothers and sons, step sons, separated partners and relationships, different family styles.
header.activity: Looking at kids book in the living room, mother and daughter.

speaker.occupation: not currently working, caring for toddler
